Merge pull request #165 from mantasmarcinkus/patch-1

appID option not being set when passed to Snoar Toast (WIN10)

Snoar Toast appID option not being set when passed

A bug I encountered was that if I would pass `appID` option for windows toast, it would be removed and not set as an option for Snoar Toast.  
For it to work I had to use `appName` option then it worked perfectly fine.  
I could've created PR for README to change the API description. 
However, code change will be more consistent for the API that `node-notifier` is using.

Merge pull request #58 from denis-sokolov/patch-1

CLI: do not show an empty message

CLI: do not show an empty message

Redirecting stdout of a tool to the notification is a really
useful workflow to receive errors: `my-tool | xargs -0 notify -m`
However, because `xargs -r` is not cross-platform,
the result is a constant stream of empty notifications.
